definition: radically new or original, any creative group active in the innovation and application of new concepts and techniques in a given field (especially in the arts)
details:
adjective
- radically new or original
= example: radically new or original
= synonyms: daring
noun
- any creative group active in the innovation and application of new concepts and techniques in a given field (especially in the arts)
= synonyms: van, vanguard, new wave
